org.efaps.update.schema.program.jasperreport

Class JasperReportImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.schema.program.AbstractSourceImporter
      • org.efaps.update.schema.program.jasperreport.JasperReportImporter

  • public class JasperReportImporter
extends AbstractSourceImporter
    Class is used to import a JasperReport into the eFaps DataBase.
